TradingCompanyImprovementDefinition.Name: TradingCompanyImprovementDust
TradingCompanyImprovementDefinition.CustomCost: (75 * (1 + Pow(Property(Context, @ClassTradingCompany, DustImprovementCount) + Property(Context, @ClassTradingCompany, LuxuryImprovementCount) / 2, 1.1)) - 50) * Property(Context, @../ClassEmpire, TradingCompanyImprovementCostReduction) * Property(Context, @../ClassEmpire, DustInflation)

TradingCompanyImprovementDefinition.Name: TradingCompanyImprovementLuxury
TradingCompanyImprovementDefinition.CustomCost: (75 * (1 + Pow(Property(Context, @ClassTradingCompany, DustImprovementCount) / 2 + Property(Context, @ClassTradingCompany, LuxuryImprovementCount), 1.1)) - 50) * Property(Context, @../ClassEmpire, TradingCompanyImprovementCostReduction) * Property(Context, @../ClassEmpire, DustInflation)
